    Fields in Unnamed Package declared as Item
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Item
    Corner.item
    Describes which item is contained in the corner.
    private Item
    CardGolden.requiredItem
    If not null, specifies the item to be used as multiplier for the points awarded to the player.
    Fields in Unnamed Package with type parameters of type Item
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Map<Item,Integer>
    Player.playerItemsCounter
    A map that is functionally a counter for the Items currently held by the player.
    private Map<Item,Integer>
    Model.Objectives.ObjectiveItem.requiredItems
    Map containing the required resources to satisfy the objective.
    The Keys of the map are the items and the Values are the number of units required.
